member.name: IProgressItems.get_Count
member.summary: Retrieves the number of progress items in the collection.
member.param: Number of progress items in the collection.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IProgressItems.get_EnumProgressItems
member.summary: Retrieves the list of progress items from the collection.
member.param: An interface that contains a collection of the progress items contained in the collection.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IProgressItems.get_Item
member.summary: Retrieves the specified progress item from the collection.
member.param: Zero-based index number corresponding to a progress item in the collection.
An interface associated with the specified index value.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

One or more arguments are not valid.
Value: 0x80070057

member.name: IProgressItems.get__NewEnum
member.summary: Retrieves the list of progress items from the collection.
member.param: An IEnumVariant interface that you use to enumerate the progress items contained within the collection. Each item of the enumeration is a VARIANT whose type is VT_DISPATCH. Query the pdispVal member to retrieve the interface.

returns.para: S_OK is returned when the number of requested elements (celt) are returned successfully or the number of returned items (pceltFetched) is less than the number of requested elements. The celt and pceltFetched parameters are defined by IEnumVariant.
Other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IProgressItems.ProgressItemFromBlock
member.summary: Retrieves a progress item based on the specified block number.
member.param: Block number of the progress item to retrieve. The method returns the progress item if the block number is in the first and last block range of the item.
An interface associated with the specified block number.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

One or more arguments are not valid.
Value: 0x80070057

member.name: IProgressItems.ProgressItemFromDescription
member.summary: Retrieves a progress item based on the specified file name.
member.param: String that contains the file name of the progress item to retrieve. The method returns the progress item if this string matches the value for item's description property.
An interface of the progress item associated with the specified file name.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

One or more arguments are not valid.
Value: 0x80070057

summary.para: Use this interface to enumerate the progress items in a result image. A progress item represents a segment of the result image.
To get this interface, call the method.
